body.p: The contributors to ISIS appreciate acknowledgement of their efforts in publications and data products that have used the ISIS software package in whole or in part. The following is the preferred way to acknowledge their contributions.

The correct acknowledgement for the ISIS software package is as follows:
This research has made use of the USGS Integrated Software for Imagers and Spectrometers (ISIS).
This project uses a Zenodo generated DOI. The badge above links to the DOI for the latest release.
